name: Pilot Trainer For X-Wing
description:
X-Wing Miniatures is a tactical table top game that requires skill. Pilot Trainer for X-Wing sharpens pilots skills through a unique set of mini-games.

Requirements
  • Linux 64-bit operating system
Development

This game was produced for the Linux Game Jam 2017 which was a 4 day event. This game currently lacks polish and features like Bank, Turn, & Special Maneuvers. If there is interest in this project, I could put some more time into flushing it out to be a more complete game. I would also be interested in open sourcing this as well (through GPL), but I didn't even have time to create a git repo.
